Get ready to embark on a cinematic journey featuring one of Hollywoodâ€™s most beloved actresses, Sarah Jessica Parker! In this movie roundup article, weâ€™ll be diving deep into her impressive filmography, exploring the diverse roles sheâ€™s taken on and the unforgettable stories sheâ€™s brought to life on the silver screen. From romantic comedies to dramatic thrillers, weâ€™ve got you covered with insightful commentary and a behind-the-scenes look at her most memorable movie moments.

As an Amazonâ„¢ Associate, we earn from qualifying purchases.

1. Somewhere, Tomorrow (1983)

Somewhere, Tomorrowâ€ is a 1983 drama-fantasy film featuring a heart-wrenching confrontation with the supernatural. At a horse farm, a teenage girl witnesses a plane crash and has a conversation with one of the passengers; however, she soon discovers he was one of the victims in the accident.
